statement: I am the author of my own life, and only I hold the pen.
Knowing my own worth is the beginning of all achievement.
The way I see myself is the way the world will see me.
Self-worth comes from one thing – thinking that I am worthy.
I am enough just as I am.
To be myself in a world that is constantly trying to make me something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Everything I need is already within me.
What I think of myself is much more important than what others think of me.
The most important relationship I will ever have is the one I have with myself.
When I trust myself, I'm already halfway there.
I am not my mistakes. I am the learning I gain from them.
Confidence is not 'they will like me'. Confidence is 'I'll be fine if they don't'.
True confidence is not about being perfect, it's about accepting myself just as I am.
The key to success is believing I am worthy of success.
Self-love is not selfish. I cannot truly love others until I learn to love myself.
The only approval I need is my own.
Stop waiting for external validation, and start validating myself.
Confidence is silent. Insecurities are loud.
The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to myself.
I am not here to shrink myself, I am here to shine.
The energy I put out into the world comes back to me.
Don't wait for someone else to give me permission to be me.
I am more than enough.
The only person I should try to be better than is the person I was yesterday.
My value does not decrease based on someone else's inability to see my worth.
I cannot pour from an empty cup.
I am worthy of all the abundance and love I desire.
Nothing can dim the light that shines from within me.
True self-worth is not something I earn. It’s something I remember.
Believe in myself, and I’ll be unstoppable.
Don't let someone else's opinion of me become my reality.
The way to gain a good reputation is to endeavor to be what I desire to appear.
I cannot be lonely if I like the person I'm alone with.
I don't have to be perfect to be worthy.
The most beautiful thing I can wear is confidence.
Be proud of who I am and not ashamed of how someone else sees me.
I can have anything I want if I am willing to give up the belief that I can't have it.
I am worthy of every success and every good thing in this world.
When I stop being afraid, that's when I become unstoppable.
Lack of self-worth is a source of all human suffering.
Growth is uncomfortable, but I am worthy of it.
